name: Compfire
description:
Keep your camp fire alive!

You play a Scout who got lost at night. Thankfully you got you camp fire.
How long can you keep the fire alive?

Check out how the game was made:
Yannick: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKsO3tjZNcKtRTYfhv-rQuA
SteffoSpieler: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwlgu73y8ZXbadefc7UHwdA
